text: Year as Long as Life () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Roshal.Друзья, коллеги и почитатели таланта скорбят по поводу кончины КвашиГОД КАК ЖИЗНЬ It stars Igor Kvasha, Andrey Mironov, and Rufina Nifontova. == Actors == * Igor Kvasha as Karl Marx * Andrey Mironov as Friedrich Engels * Rufina Nifontova * Anatoliy Solovyov * Aleksey Alekseev * Vasiliy Livanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal
title: Year as Long as Life
